Package services

Class PharmacistService

java.lang.Object
services.PharmacistService
public class PharmacistService extends Object
Service class for managing pharmacists and their interactions with appointments, inventory, and medications. The class provides functionality to load pharmacists, manage appointments, and handle inventory-related tasks.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a PharmacistService with the specified user, appointment, and inventory services.

    • PharmacistService

      public PharmacistService(UserService userService, AppointmentService appointmentService, InventoryService inventoryService)
      Constructs a PharmacistService with the specified user, appointment, and inventory services.
      Parameters:
      userService - the user service instance for retrieving user details
      appointmentService - the appointment service instance for managing appointments
      inventoryService - the inventory service instance for managing medication stock

      Returns:

    • updatePharmacistContact

      Updates the contact information of a pharmacist.
      Parameters:

      newContactInformation - the new contact information to set
      Returns:
